_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Dependent Origination [sn12.1:3.14]: Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress
Cessation of Suffering (a causal chain): Ignorance fades away and ceases with nothing left over
Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
